name: Mahjong Elements
description:
Mahjong Elements is also available for iPad and Mac OSX!

•EXCEPTIONAL MAHJONG EXPERIENCE
Behold the true elemental power of this aesthetically appealing Mahjong experience. It offers over 50 hours of exceptional Mahjong solitaire game play in one complete package.

• CHI ENERGY AND XIESHENG ART
The menu design and background images were conceived and created together with Feng-Shui experts and other Chinese artists in order to revive the fascinating technique of ancient Xiesheng watercolor.

• REGAIN MENTAL BALANCE
It is said that viewers of this art benefit from improved energy flow and lasting mental balance. This game will provide you that very peace and tranquility, whenever you may need it.

• PRESS REVIEWS
app Safari: “Mahjong fans will love this one”
Wirebot: “The graphics are gorgeous and the music is calming, an ideal stress reliever.”


Feature Overview:

✓ More than 200 Layouts
✓ Animated Menu Design
✓ Retina Display Support
✓ Shuffle, Hint and Undo Functions
✓ No Time Limit
✓ Fever Mode
✓ Authentic HD Xiesheng Art
✓ Unique Help Features
✓ Zoom, Pinch and Drag Feature
✓ Easy-Touch Interface
✓ Extensive Stats Tracking
✓ Game Center Achievements
